title: Quarterly average daily rate of hotels in Atlanta 2016 to 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Quarters on X-axis for 2 groups 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Average daily rate in USD.
All through the Quarters, similar trend was observed for 2017 and 2016. In both cases, the Average daily rate in USD have lowered.
In Quarter Q1, 2017 had the highest Average daily rate in USD 170.0 among the 2 groups and in Q2, 2017 had the lowest Average daily rate in USD 0.0.
In Quarter Q1, 2017 had the maximum Average daily rate in USD and it saw the lowest in Quarter Q2 out of all 4 Quarters.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Quarters on X-axis for 2 groups 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Average daily rate in USD.
All through the Quarters, similar trend was observed for 2017 and 2016. In both cases, the Average daily rate in USD have lowered.
Quarter Q1 had the maximum Average daily rate in USD among all 2 groups, and it was for 2017. The minimum Average daily rate in USD was observed in Quarter Q2 for 2017.
Among all the Quarters, 2017 had the highest Average daily rate in USD 170.0 in Quarter Q1 and lowest value 0.0 in Quarter Q2.
There is a gap of 170.0 between the highest and lowest Average daily rate in USD found for 2017 in Quarter Q1 and Q2.
Among the groups, 2016 had the biggest difference in Average daily rate in USD. Where the maximum Average daily rate in USD was 1.04 times larger than the minimum Average daily rate in USD.
On average, the Quarter Q1 had the highest Average daily rate in USD for all 2 groups 2016, and 2017. Whereas Q4 had the lowest average Average daily rate in USD.
